name: Vasilia
overview:
Vasilia is a beauty boutique which offers customers a carefully selected collection of the world’s finest and purest natural beauty & organic products, ranging from skincare, bath products, hair care and baby care.

All products have been formulated by experts equally passionate about natural and organic ingredients. Here at Vasilia we have selected products not only for their quality but also their effectiveness and beauty.

The difference between Vasilia and all other organic beauty shops is its unique location, the Mediterranean and the Aegean Sea. Homeland of Vasilia is Greece, a country well known for its rich production of olive oil, the mother country of mastic and abundant natural thermal water springs.
